description: Thanks to Karl’s efforts, the Allies are one step closing to finding out the nature of ‘Deathstorm’, the Nazis’ top secret atomic project. Dispatched to the heavily guarded University of Niroli in the Fascist-controlled north of Italy, Karl must locate an Italian scientist forced to work for the Nazis. Deathstorm: Infiltration is the second mission in a thrilling new three-part campaign for 1-2 players, sending Karl on a daring mission well behind enemy lines...
name: Sniper Elite 4 - Deathstorm Part 2: Infiltration
